alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 6:32PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Light to Moderate Snow Continues... A narrow band of light to moderate snow will move east southeast across the area through around 8 PM this evening. Under the strongest snow, visibility will fall to around one half mile. Snow accumulation up to one inch will be possible in some locations, with snow covered roads and slippery conditions likely this evening. Those traveling across the area, especially along I-25 from Colorado Springs to Pueblo, should use caution and be prepared for hazardous driving conditions.
